topics.body:
I've heard the 3DS Sonic Boom isn't nearly as bad as the Wii U version. Still not great, but not terrible.

"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546ceb426368727eb4690100#post_546ceb426368727eb4690100
Because even though there are a lot of bad Sonic games (Shadow, Sonic 06, Secret Rings, Lost World, the Game Gear games), there are lots of great ones as well (the Genesis trilogy & Knuckles, Adventure 1 & 2, Heroes (in my opinion anyways), Colors, and Generations).

At least sonic '06 gave us some hilarity:
"FLYING AROUND AT THE SPEED OF ROUND"

"You have to, like, d- oh, oh oh, oh- ohhhhhhhhhh... okay... Arin, don't leave. Arin, don't... AAARIIIIN! I LOVE YOU!"
"No, I'm fucking done! I'm fucking done!"
"No you're not" 
"This is BULLSHIT!" 
"I'm gonna climb..." 
"THIS IS FUCKING BULLSHIT!!" 
"Wh- I can't! Arin! I can't get off!" 
"WHAT IS THIS?!" 
"I CAN'T GET OFF!" 
"WHAT IS THIS?!" 
"I'M STUCK!" 
"WHAT IS MY LIFE?!"
